GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves a review by specified id

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments by specified review_id

users.title: Build you own tour de Yorkshire
users.review_body: Cold rain pours on the faces of your team of cyclists, you pulled to the front of the pack early and now your taking on exhaustion cards like there is not tomorrow, you think there are about 2 hands left until you cross the finish line, will you draw enough from your deck to cross before the other team shoot passed? Flamee Rouge is a Racing deck management game where you carefully manage your deck in order to cross the line before your opponents, cyclist can fall slyly behind front runners in their slipstreams to save precious energy for the prefect moment to burst into the lead

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: posts the body as a comment to the specified review by review_id

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: increments the review via the body of the request - specified by review_id
